name: Starvoly
description:
Can you survive in tough rivals and harsh environments? If you think you can do this, collect items, make craft, build your house and help the villagers. But be wary of the giant spiders! In the Starvoly game our hero must use what nature has given to survive alone.He must hunt and fish, he must produce resources by breaking down the rocks and trees.You have to reach the teleport to reach the biomes.Build your house, equip your weapons and do the tasks.

FEATURES:

Singleplayer! Survive by yourself.
Craft and craft stations! Build equipment, weapons, armors, foods, potions and more to help you stay alive.
Wild animals, neutral animals, zombies, mummies and monsters! Kill the animals and monsters to stay alive.
Farming! Growing plants and harvest.Don't forget to water!
Task and story with dialouges! Follow the story for gain to rare items.
Day and night and temperature system! Be careful to temperature in desert and winter biomes.Dont forget drink water in desert!
Hunting! Kill animals for meat and skin.
Building! Build house, tent, craft stations for survive.
Treasure map! Follow the treasure map to find the rare items.
Pet! Find a pet for fight the enemy, hunt the animals and dig the graves.
And more...

FUTURE PLANS:

More bioms,
More items,
More stories,
More AI's
And more...
We continue to work on multiplayer and many language options..
